entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Christening Card 'Christening Boy'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Christening Cards
Price: 21.25

Welcoming a baby boy into a community of faith is very important. Sending a heartfelt note of congratulations or warm wishes during this special time is essential. This Christening handmade card embodies the essence of this occasion. Adorned with delicate blue and white artificial flowers, ribbon roses, blue and clear crystals, and a diamante cross pendant, it exudes elegance and charm. This card is an ideal choice for celebrating the beginning of a baby's journey after being christened. Its simple yet classic design serves as a timeless memento of this important milestone in a new child's life.

Presented in our signature luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside, the card can be personalised with your own message both on the front and inside, making it a perfect keepsake for this special occasion.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Christening Card 'Christening Girl'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Christening Cards
Price: 21.25

Little girls are often surrounded by the colour pink. Our Christening greeting card is designed especially for baby girls embarking on their Christian journey. Adorned with delicate pink and white artificial flowers, ribbon roses, pink and clear crystals, and a diamante cross pendant, it emanates elegance and charm. This card is an excellent choice for commemorating a baby's christening, marking the beginning of her spiritual path. Its simple yet classic design ensures it remains a timeless keepsake of this significant milestone in the child's life.

Presented in our distinctive luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside, the card can be personalised with your own message on both the front and inside, making it a perfect memento for this special occasion.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Christening Card 'Christening Bouquet'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Christening Cards
Price: 23.75

For a truly elegant handmade Christening card, look no further. The Christening Day is a significant occasion deserving of a special acknowledgment. This card boasts a bouquet crafted from ribbon roses and artificial flowers, embellished with clear crystals, white pearls, and a grey satin bow. The diamante cross pendant positioned above the bouquet completes the exquisite design.

Presented beautifully in a luxury gift box, this Christening card can be personalised with your own message, both on the front and inside.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Mother’s Day Card 'Lilac Posy Heart'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Mother's Day Cards
Price: 22.95

Crafted in gentle lilac hues, this exquisite Mother's Day card is adorned with a delicate heart fashioned from ribbon roses, pom-poms, and gypsophila flowers. The whole arrangement embellished with shimmering crystals, pearls, and elegant white chiffon ribbon.

The card can be customised with your personal message both on front and inside. Whether for Mothering Sunday or simply to express your love, this card is a thoughtful gesture. It comes elegantly presented in a luxurious gift box, ensuring it becomes a cherished keepsake for your beloved mother.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Valentines Bouquet Card 'Valentino'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 25.00

A stunning handmade Valentine’s Day card - a perfect pick to let that special person in your life know that you are meant to be together. It is presented in a specially designed gift box and can be personalised with your own words on the cover and inside, making it a truly special card. The design features a Valentine’s Day bouquet made from artificial flowers and ribbon roses, bunny tails, and faux greenery. This Valentine's card is beautifully presented in a luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Luxury Boxed Christmas Card 'Santa's Stocking'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Christmas Cards
Price: 23.50

So Christmassy, so cheerful, so merry and so appreciated by anyone who will receive it. Convey the spirit of Christmas in memorable way with this fabulously hand-crafted Santa's Stocking card featuring a large gold paper Christmas stocking gorgeously bejewelled with frosted branches and berries, pom poms and gold paper roses, gold padded stars, crystals and gold satin bow. The card itself hand finished with gold metallic and wooden stars. It is beautifully presented in luxury gift box and can be personalised with a personal message on front and inside.

entry.title: A4 Boxed Handmade Christmas Card ‘Classic Pine Wreath’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Christmas Cards
Price: 43.50

A really elegant card to wish someone a Merry Christmas. Wonderful choice for anyone who likes a good design and attention to detail. Presented is a special box and personalised with your own words, this card are not just a card but also a wonderful keepsake.

The main feature of the design is a traditional Christmas wreath made from faux pine branches and greenery. The arrangement is decorated with white gypsophila flowers, natural dried flax and golden bells. Green moss chiffon ribbon on the wreath completes this classy design.

entry.title: A4 Boxed Handmade Christmas Card ‘Magic Time’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Christmas Cards
Price: 43.50

A special card for a special person in your life at Christmas time. This Christmas card is unique and personal, and can be personalised with any words you like on front and inside. It will make a great Christmas gift in itself for your Husband or Wife, Boyfriend and Girlfriend, Fiancé or Fiancée, or any other special person.

The design boasts a festive bouquet made from faux foliage and frosted branches, artificial flowers and ribbon roses, pearl bead spray and bunny tails, wooden snowflakes, stars and beige satin ribbons. The card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Christmas Card 'Festive Wreath'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Christmas Cards
Price: 22.50

This handmade Christmas card is truly luxurious and personal, and can be customised with your own words both on front inside. The box and presentation make this look like a gift in itself. The main feature of the design is a Christmas wreath made from green pine and frosted branches. The arrangement is embellished with white wooden snowflakes, stars, silver padded stars and paper roses. Green stain bow with crystal in the middle adds dimension and completes this classy design.

Scattered crystals and stars complete the look of this magical festive motif. This Christmas card is beautifully presented in a gift box and can be personalised with your own message on front and inside.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Father's Day Card 'DAD'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Father's Day Cards
Price: 16.85

This simple and elegant individually boxed Father's Day will be a great gift itself to your Dad on Father's Day or his birthday. It can be personalised with your own special message on front and inside and makes a gorgeous keepsake.

The cover this design boasts the word 'DAD' with both 'D' letters printed in black colour and letter 'A' printed in red on round frame filled with water baubles and fashionably adorned with crystal clear and red real crystals.

This Father's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A4 Boxed Mother’s Day Card 'Garden Bouquet'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Mother's Day Cards
Price: 43.50

Show your appreciation for your mum this Mother's Day with our handmade 'Garden Bouquet' card. Boxed, luxurious, and personalised, this card is sure to leave a lasting and heartfelt impression that she won't forget. The main theme of the design is a garden bouquet made form artificial flowers, greenery and real dry grasses, tied with mauve chiffon ribbon with frayed edge. Wishing her the best day ever – is there a better way to show your love?
